uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.network

Class NClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.motor.IReasonerDefault
      • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.motor.IClassifier
        • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.network.NClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReasoner
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ORClassifier

    public abstract class NClassifier
extends IClassifier
    Abstract base-class for extensions of NClassifier that operate on the intermediate network-based representation.

    The instance-level frames that are passed to the classify(IFrame, IClassifierOps) method, are converted into instantiations of the network-based representation, and then passed to the corresponding abstract method.

    The classification process can be customised by adding one or more pre-processors to modify the networks that will be passed to the abstract classification method (see addPreProcessor(uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.network.NProcessor)).

      protected IClassification classify(IFrame instance, IClassifierOps ops)
      Converts the specified instance-level instance frame to the network-based representation, runs any registered pre-processors over the resulting network, then invokes classify(NNode, IClassifierOps) to perform the classification operation.
      protected abstract IClassification classify(NNode instance, IClassifierOps ops)
      Performs the classification operation.
